summary: After about 2 and a half years of research the wait is over ladies and gentleman.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10294373_10152402941704189_6137391144572516402_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
After about 2 and a half years of research and the thousands and thousands of lines of code and many sleepless nights involved, me and a team of 14 very dedicated people like yourselfs have finally made this become reality. Ever since we were little we dreamed of making this possible and have now reached our goal. We have tryed in the past but failed due to the technology at the time but only with today's revolutionary technology we have at our disposal this has be made possible. Ladies and gentleman I proudly present to you an apple. The apple is a masterpiece if there ever was one and if you look up masterpiece in the dictionary you will find a URL to this modification. The apple is located at the throat of the world at the dragon wall. I really hope you enjoy all our hard work. Thank you and I know this will change gaming forever...
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10270824_10152402965709189_6646931807125246817_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Use NMM for easy install otherwise just drop the file downloaded into your Skyrim directory.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10291794_10152402965374189_2040155054134122673_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Simply deactivate in NMM or delete the .esp
[line][/center]
author: HarrisModifications
